extension_name.description: The name of the extension (robust reload).

extension_description.message: An experimental chrome extension that lets you reload the current tab from the omnibar using simple commands. Just hit "r" + tab.
extension_description.description: The description of the extension as seen on the extension panel.

suggestion.message: Enter a comma-separated list of intervals (<match>"20,1:00,1:20,1:00:00,10"</match>), <match>"about"</match> or <match>"config"</match>.
suggestion.description: The suggestion shown under the omnibar when the user starts typing a command. Use <match> tag to highlight strings.

command_all_prefix.description: The prefix to control all open tabs.

command_all_prefix_description.message: Run following command for all tabs.
command_all_prefix_description.description: A description for the "all" prefix for commands.

command_clear_description.message: Clears all intervals and stops the reloading.
command_clear_description.description: The description of the clear command.

command_pause_description.message: Cancels the current interval and pauses the reloading.
command_pause_description.description: The description of the pause command.

command_start_description.description: The description of the start or unpause command.

command_config_description.message: Opens the optiof of the extension.
command_config_description.description: The description of the config command.

command_about_description.message: Opens the website of the extension.
command_about_description.description: The description of the about command.

alert_unrecognized_input.message: This command could not be processed. Would you like to see a list of possible commands?
alert_unrecognized_input.description: The message that informs the user of unrecognized input and suggests a look at the possible commands.

notification_cleared.description: The notification that appears after a "clear" command.

notification_paused.description: The notification that appears after a "pause" command.

notification_started_again.description: The notification that appears after a "start" command.

notification_started.description: The notification that appears after new intervals have been entered.

options_available_commands.description: The title of the table of available commands.

options_interval_separator.description: The description of the options field "interval_separator".

options_enable_notifications.description: The description of the option field "enable_notifications".

options_notification_timeout.description: The description of the option field "notification_timeout".

options_show_page_action.message: Show icon in the omnibar when the plugin is active
options_show_page_action.description: The description of the option field "show_page_action".

options_show_page_action_progress.message: Show progress of current interval on the ommibar icon
options_show_page_action_progress.description: The description of the option field "show_page_action_progress".

options_show_page_action_countdown.message: Show countdown in the ommibar icon 10 seconds before a reload
options_show_page_action_countdown.description: The description of the option field "show_page_action_countdown".

page_action_title_interval.description: The title of the page action if the countdown is disabled. Use {interval}.

page_action_title_paused.description: The title of the page action if the reloading has been paused.

page_action_title_interval_countdown.message:
Current interval: {interval} seconds.
Next reload in: {leftover} seconds.
page_action_title_interval_countdown.description: The title of the page action if the countdown is enabled. Use {interval} and {leftover}.

page_action_interval_list.description: The string describing the list of intervals displayed on the popup.

page_action_input_placeholder.description: The placeholder string within the input on the popup.
